name: I Was Forced by the System to Become a Villain
author: 子曰文化
content: Lin Bei, who traveled through time and became the second senior brother of Lingxi Peak of the Qingyun Sect, determined to be a good person, but ended up getting entangled in a system that specialized in cultivating supervillains.Lin Bei had no choice but to go against his original intention and turn into a big bad guy to compete with the countless children of destiny on the Kyushu Continent for luck and save his life.
